ProjectOptionTypes.name: Aggregate Default Override
ProjectOptionTypes.description: Controls whether setting/altering aggregates is overridden (default), or raises an exception.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Type base URI
ProjectOptionTypes.description: The base URI for the types of relationships

ProjectOptionTypes.name: HTTPS only
ProjectOptionTypes.description: Whether only HTTPS can be used to communicate with this project.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Metadata name
ProjectOptionTypes.description: The name of the metadata section in the JSON objects, by default @metadata

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Checksum Size Limit
ProjectOptionTypes.description: Maximum size LOB object to include its contents in checksum.  If LOB contents are larger, only the length is used for checksum calculations.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Inline Limit Default
ProjectOptionTypes.description: Default value for the maximum size CHAR/BINARY object to include its contents in the response. Can be changed on a per request basis with 'inlinelimit' parameter.  See also per request 'inline' and 'deferred' parameters.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Page Size Default
ProjectOptionTypes.description: Number of records returned. Can be overridden on a per request basis with 'pagesize' parameter.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Maximum Page Size
ProjectOptionTypes.description: Maximum value for Page Size.  Silently capped to this number.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Chunk Size Default
ProjectOptionTypes.description: Tuning parameter for queries. Can be overridden on a per request basis with 'chunksize' parameter. Controls how many parents are combined into a single query when retrieving child rows.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Stored Procedure Row Limit
ProjectOptionTypes.description: This is a limit for the number of rows returned for each result set returned by a stored procedure before truncating.  Can be overridden on a per request basis with 'procrowlimit' parameter.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Stored Procedure Inline Limit
ProjectOptionTypes.description: This is a limit for the length of binary/character data returned.  A {"procInlineLimitExceeded" : limit } object will be returned instead of the value.  Can be overridden on a per request basis with 'procinlinelimit' parameter.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Permit Authorization parameter in URL
ProjectOptionTypes.description: When true, the parameter auth=ApiKey:ApiSig can be used in the URL.  When false, the Authorization header in the HTTP request MUST be used.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Default response format
ProjectOptionTypes.description: The default format for the response

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Allow Swagger without authentication
ProjectOptionTypes.description: If true, retrieving Swagger documentation does not require authentication. Many Swagger consumers do not support authentication.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Tech docs URL
ProjectOptionTypes.description: An optional URL to technical documentation for this project.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Audit User Transactions
ProjectOptionTypes.description: This will Audit PUT/POST/DELETE user transactions to the userTxAudit table

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Maximum size of connection pool (per database)
ProjectOptionTypes.description: The maximum number of connections in the connection pool for each database in this project.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Disallow free-form filters and sorts
ProjectOptionTypes.description: If true, this API will not allow free-form queries or sorts: any requests with free-form filters or sorts will fail.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: User docs URL
ProjectOptionTypes.description: An optional URL to user documentation for this project.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: Provide detailed security debugging
ProjectOptionTypes.description: If greater than 0, this API will include more information about everything related to security. Valid values go from 0 (no extra logging) to 5 (maximum logging). This option should be turned off for production, as some of the feedback will leak information that should normally not be shared.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: JSON Negative Infinity
ProjectOptionTypes.description: The string to emit for Negative Infinity values.  By default, CA Live API Creator emits null, some suggested values are  "-Infinity", -Infinity, -1/0 depending on the downstream usage.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: JSON NaN (Signaling)
ProjectOptionTypes.description: The string to emit for Signaling NaN values. By default, CA Live API Creator emits null, some suggested values are  "NaN", "sNaN", sNaN, -0/0, FMT=sNaN{0,choice,1#|1<({0,number,integer})} depending on the downstream usage.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: JSON Positive Infinity
ProjectOptionTypes.description: The string to emit for Positive Infinity values.  By default, CA Live API Creator emits null, some suggested values are  "Infinity", Infinity, 1/0 depending on the downstream usage.

ProjectOptionTypes.name: JSON NaN (Quiet)
ProjectOptionTypes.description: The string to emit for Quiet NaN values. By default, CA Live API Creator emits null, some suggested values are  "NaN", NaN, 0/0, FMT=NaN{0,choice,0#|0<({0,number,integer})} depending on the downstream usage.
